overview: Miko is still seeking true love, along with Dovi, the most confident person who lives with him, and Anca their faithful housekeeper.  Miko always fails every time he is close to a girl. Rian, who has been a stand-up comedian in the boats, believes that it is caused by the curse of the Miko’s past, because Rian always dream to see something related to an item kept by Miko since secondary school. They are trying to trace friends from their secondary school who are likely the cause of the curse.  Dovi continues to struggle with problems of his study in law school that makes ​​him stress. He gets assignment from his lecturer to accompany a group of foreign students, Alexandra, Suzuki, and Mamadi around Jakarta and must meet specified targets. Dovi had to prove his worth for the sake of his studies.
title: Malam Minggu Miko The Movie
